reviews: Canned, served in a trappist goblet. A clear copper-hued pour with an ash-white head that leaves a ring for good. Aroma is peach, porridge, arugula. Bone dry onset. Crisp, full-bodied mouthfeel. Incredibly bitter finish (one of the bitterest beers I've had outside the undrinkable 黑 from Mikkeller -sorry if I stepped on some toes.) Very long-lasting finish with hints of conifer resin all over. Clearly over the top.
Hazy golden. Aroma is tropic fruit pine caramel resin grassy hops. Taste is heavy resinous hop bitterness. Pretty dense with long hop finish. Rough and nice.

Can from Super Valu Ratoath. Pours cloudy Amber with minimal white head. Aroma is citrus fruit, pine, hops. Flavour has an intense full mouth of hops but combined with lots of fruit in the mouth. Medium to high  carbonation. Pine, caramel, malt and lots of hops. Thick texture. Long bitter hoppy finish.

Very industrial but hoppy still with nice features. Easy to drink and not too raspy in the throat after several sips.

Colore dorato, schiuma media poco persistente, aromi erbacei, resina, fiori bianchi. Buona carbonazione, al palato, erba, corteccia, lievi sentori fruttati e di miele. Corpo medio, finale decisamente amaro. Una birra ben equilibrata, gli aromi non sono eccessivi, la componente amara caratterizza la bevuta.
Alone at home. Hazy amber colored beer with small white head and only few carbonation. Hopped fruited aroma. Full sparkling palate. Finish is strong bitter dry, reminds of tonic taste.

Can from Systembolaget. I didn't get to rate this as well as i should but I remember a class and bold West coast IPA. Need to retry if i get the chance.
Quite happy. Pleasent after taste. Drink on a full stomach. I'd describe it as very full.
can @ british store (budapest) golden orange colour, normal body, average carbonated, white head, bittersweet, hoppy, malty, fruity, citrus, dry in the end, easy to drink
That's a nice piece of bitterness. The taste is a little on the low end, but all in all a very tasty IPA one should have Taster
Honningfarvet, uklar og fint rigeligt skum. Let citrusduft. Meget bitter med smag af citrus. Slet ikke min smag.
Slight hazy golden pour. Aroma of citrus and grapefruit with a slight hint of pineapple. Flavour of citrus and pineapple. Dry bitter finish with malt hints.

A very tall tall-boy (19.2 US fl oz) can from Denman Liquor in Vancouver’s West End. 

A 6 oz pour into a snifter. Medium amber, translucent, moderate head, nose smells of beer. A good thing!
Taste wise, this is a classic, traditional West coast IPA. Very nicely balanced, with hops and malt aplenty, oh yeah! Great stuff!

I've had Stone IPA many, many times over the years, but apparently not at a time I could write a review.   Juicy, pineapple, orange and tropical fruit aromas from a slightly hazy medium orange/yellow body with a foamy white head.  The juiciness in the aroma gives way to a fairly dry, bracing bitterness that still has some pineapple but much more grapefruit and citrus pith.  The balance of dry bitterness to juicy fruit sweetness is what makes this such a classic IPA.  Not to heavy, not to light, and just strong enough at 6.9% ABV to make it spicy but maintain that balance.  There's also a distinctive hop spiciness that lays down on the tongue and stays there.  Lot's of that and tropical fruit sweetness at the end.  This is really an amazing IPA from a great brewery that was a founder of the West Coast IPA style.
Puszka. Pomarańczowe, nieprzejrzyste z niewielką pianą. W aromacie wyczuwalne chmiele. W smaku pełne, słodkie, czuć sosnowe aromaty. Smaczne

0,355l can from Kaufland store drinking 11/09/2021 Canned 05/10/20 Enjoy by 05/10/21 according to bottom. Pours a slightly hazy yellowish pale orange body with large frothy off-white foam on top, lots of lacing. Aroma of malt, citrus, grapefruit, tropical fruits, and pretty intense earthy, resinous, grassy and piney hops. Taste is even better with a good malt base and moderate sweet, juicy fruit flavours, citrus, grapefruit, orange, also a high bitter and lots of earthy, grassy and resinous hops flavours, dry bitter hoppy finish. Medium body, oily texture and moderate carbonation. Love the bitter hoppiness here, great west-coast style classic Ipa.

color: naranja ligeramente turbia, espuma blanca 1 dedo poco duradera.
olor: cítrico, pino, frutal.
sabor: amargor medio-bajo, cuerpo medio, final seco, persistencia larga, llena toda la boca, muy equilibrada, carbonatacion media.
Very long super tall metal can.  Fruit flavors that are well blended together.  Medium body. Average carbonation. Pleasant finish.

12fl oz can

This is the most notable IPA for my life, this one is balance between malts and hops, and clean body.

The taste coming with bread from malt, light-medium sweet from malt, hops taste coming with piney, a little bit of citrus, passion fruit, a little bit of orange.

Yes this is the good one, worth of all pennies for this IPA beer.

Aroma: Juicy fruity hops with grapefruit. Flavour: Dry fruity bitter with notes of grapefruit. Aftertaste is dry fruity bitter. 
Colour: Golden amber with a white head. 
From: Can @ Nemlig webshop.

0,33 can. Zöld gargoyle szörnyös dobozban hatalmas krémes, tömör fehér habbal egy szép világos-borostyán sör. Zöldfüves, gyantás, komlós IPA illat. Kortyra szárazan, gyantásan, és igencsak keserűen nyit. Igazi IPA. Hab végig szép, és finom is. Érdemes kóstolni, mivel "harapható".  A sör gyengén (közepesen) szénsavas, jó gyantás, keserű "alap" IPA, de ezek között nagyon "vegytiszta" és testes, ezért kiemelkedő az átlagból. Finom volt nagyon. Az alkoholt nem érezni, keserű sör kedvelőként úgy érzem egymás után innám őket :)

Lattina. Il gusto al naso propende per il luppolo. L'olfatto viene stimolato in maniera elevata, permanendo in maniera ha una buona tenuta. La grandezza delle bollicine è a grana media. Il liquido è di consistenza limpida. La frizzantezza si presenta sotto forma di bollicine medio-fini, con carbonazione vivace e persistente. Il colore è giallo dorato carico. Il corpo è strutturato. L'amaro è carico. La forza gustativa è molto elevata e la permanenza è buona e persistente. Le sensazioni boccali finali risultano di amaro. Il retrogusto è intenso. Il tetto della bocca riconosce impressioni di miele, crosta di pane, luppolo, resina, agrumi, pompelmo, ananas, frutta passita e spezie.

Pours between straw and pale gold, a tad foggy with white foam and nice retention over a calm texture. First sip is bitter, sharp and a slap of hops. Then it's a strong piney flavor with straw and weeds notes. Sometimes a echo of citrus and pineapple comes through. Body is dry and firm. Finish is clean with an overwhelming resinous hoppiness that sticks to the throat. Aftertaste is a big fat hop between your tonsils.
Nice amber colour with lasting white head. Smell of bitter hops, fruits and citrus. Taste is really classic IPA with a fantastic bitterness. Great

Aroma of pine, hops, flowers, mild citrus and some sweetness, like nectar
Hazy golden colour with lasting small head
Taste is really hoppy. Pine, hops, beech leaves, mild citrus, and some floral notes
Great mildly fizzy carbonation with decently thick mouthfeel

On tap at Yard House. Clear golden. Smells of pine hops and grapefruit. Tastes of grapefruit pith, pine, immediately bitter. Light caramel sweetness. Medium body. Good without being exciting, but that's why it's a classic.

Appearance: The wine is golden and slightly cloudy, the foam is delicate and white, and it dissipates quickly.
Bouquet: thick malt aromas with tangy citrus pomelo notes, with a hint of caramel on the edge.
Taste: Mediumbodied wine, strong taste, sweet before bitter, malt sweet caramel sweet quickly emerged, immediately covered with a large area of hops bitter, bitter lasting strong crisp, half dry, bitter back.
In short, the Stone family's masterpiece, crisp, clear style, typical of the West Coast IPA, whether to drink or slowly taste, all is good!
An amber coulored beer with a off white foam. A rich fruity smell. The fruit can also be found in the taste which lingers in the mouth. A very good beer.
Golden, very slightly hazy, with a decent white head. Rich hoppy aroma. Taste is hops, some honey, decent bitterness.

Can 33cl. @home poured into a shaker. Hazy medium golden colour, good frothy off-white head, good retention and lacing. Rich aroma pale malt, grapefruit, peach, strawberry, pine resin, spicy notes. Round taste, medium bitter and light sweet, malty, grapefruit, peach, bisquit, pine resin. Medium to full body, oily texture, soft carbonation, long lasting dry bittersweet aftertaste, malty, citrus peel, piney notes, crisp, complex and well-made IPA, very good stuff.
It's the most hoppy IPA that has broken my tongue. Still crying for it. Damn!
golden straw color with a nice foamy white head and plenty of sediment gently floating about.

Aromat: kwiaty, karmel, nieco miodu, nuty chlebowe i landyrnkowe. W smaku wytrawne, sporo kwiatowosci i ziolowosci, mocno slodowa podbudowa, akcenty karmelowe, wysoka, dluga, przyjemna goryczka o lodygowym/ziolowym charakterze. Nasycenie srednie do niskiego, cialo srednie.

Justa great IPA, what can I say. That rhymes and notice, that was a statement, not a question. Will not disappoint. It is definitely one of my go-to IPA's and I only have like three of them in my repertoire. This one makes the grade so it represents a high percentage of my IPA needs. Readily available and reasonably-priced. Very consistent with your typical Stone quality control being very evident over the long period that I have relied on this IPA for its IPA deliverance.
0,355 l can several times ago from ? . One of the best IPA-s, fruity and hoppy.

Pours a golden straw color with a nice foamy white head and plenty of sediment gently floating about. The aroma is a bit dank with hints of pine and citrus. The initial flavor has notes of honey but that is quickly followed by a barrage of dry, bitter, pallet wrecking goodness.
Blik 33cl thuis. Bitter, droog, flink hoppig, pine, fruitig, maltig, tropisch fruit, harsig. (13-11-2020).

zapach bardzo intensywny, soczysty, aż mokry świeży chmiel, żywice, sosny, lupilina, niewielkie ilości cytrusów, świeżo wyjęte z suszarki pranie, trawa, i łąkowe kwiaty. kolor złoty, lekko opalizujący, piana biała, niespecjalnie obfita i niezbyt trwała. w smaku intensywne, ale nie przesadzone, dużo świeżych roślin, liście chmielu, świeże szyszki, trochę kwiatów, słodkich owoców i landrynek gdzieś daleko w tle, kandyzowany imbir, świeżo koszone łąkowe trawy, dużo białych części z cytrusów. goryczka wysoka, cytrusowa, liściasta, ściągająca, długa. w ustach mimo mocnych smaków dość wytrawne i pijalne. nasycenie wysokie
So sollte ein IPA schmecken. Schön rund, voll, tolle Bitterkeit und feine fruchtig-harzige Noten
9 months old, online from craftbeer-shop germany. And it’s great. Fresh, balanced above all, not too bitter, great cara malt backbone. Really quintessential classic ipa.
Heerlijke droge ipa. Sterk bitter, droog mondgevoel, maar toch fruitig, iets van mandarijn en honing. Lekker.

Gold and clear with a very thick, lasting head. Floral nose. Nicely-carbonated and malty with a hoppy, bittersweet finish. Unfortunately my can was expired as of last week, so it may have lacked some of the body it normally shows off. I plan to re-rate this one.

The 6-pack was packaged on 6/3/20, so just over 9 weeks old at the time of this review (on 8/8/20).

Aroma is orange - almost sweet, hints of piney notes accompanying. A light toasty aroma underneath.

Orange-amber color, with a chill haze, ample rising bubbles to a creamy off-white head with very good retention. Nice-looking disconnected lacing. The chill haze eventually dissipates to a clear amber color.

Taste has the citrus rind (orange) biting up front, backed by some floral and orange juice flavors. The floral appears mostly as aroma that accompanies each swish in the mouth. There is sufficient malt presence, toasty bread, to provide the needed balance, but clearly the hops are the name of the game with this beer. The beer is not bitter for the first sip or two, but the bitterness builds with each successive drink to become a quite bitter beer. The aftertaste lingers for a long while and is intensely bitter.

The beer has substantial body for the style.

Overall, a very good IPA, and deserving of its iconic status in the West Coast substyle. To my palate, the bitterness is most evident in the lingering aftertaste than in the flavor of each sip itself. The bitter aftertaste comes to dominate everything before you are finished.

Really impressive IPA to drink. The nose has tropical aroma. Grapefruid, apricot, peach, orange ect. The taste is very refreshing and you get all these fruits. The mouthfeel is decent but the aftertaste is amazing. Very rare for "IPA" beers to have such a good finish. The beer it give one strong bitterness in the finish that it last many seconds. 
The carboration is moderate.
Overall one of the best IPA i have tried today.

Puszka (z Berlina, chwilę po terminie). Jasnozłoty, klarowny, piana obfita, bardzo trwała. Aromat cytrusów i niestety lekko miodowo-landrynkowego utlenienia. W smaku wytrawne, niestety z okropną, łodygową, zalegającą goryczką. Lubię wysoką goryczkę, ale ta była paskudna. Ale ocena IPY po terminie jest niewiążąca...
Golden color, citrusy hoppy aroma and a smooth bitter taste with a little bit of dry grassy aftertaste. Pretty good IPA.
Aroma of Cirrus, tropical fruits, caramel, some pine. Taste of citrus, tropical fruits, pine, caramel and some perfume note. Low bitter. Low carbonation. Retro IPA.
Plechovka od peta. Vyrazna silna chmelova vona. Zlatista farba. Chut silna chmelova velmi dlho ostava.

hvala goblet store na dostavi ovog piva.. puno sam ocekivao od ovog piva ali me razocaralo...niti blizu pravoj IPA pivi....vise malo bolje industrijsko pivo..ni alkohol se ne osjeti bas puno ..ostane gorko u ustima..

Pours an almost perfectly transparent pale orange, with about one finger of a rather dense white head that shows good enough persistence. Potent but not very rich aroma has a piney/resinous base and strong citric notes of mainly grapefruit. Taste is medium sweet and high in bitterness, with a semi-dry, lingering bitter aftertaste. Light malty (crackery kind of) base, resinous bitterness, citric notes as per aroma. Bitter finish is resinous and slightly earthy. Medium bodied with average  to high carbonation in an overall lively mouthfeel that felt perhaps a little too burpy to me. Overall, a straightforward west-coast ipa. Good at that, but not really interesting or especially enjoyable to me.
Can. Aroma of malt, candy and skunk. Medium bitter flavor, balanced out by a light sweetness. Grassy finish.
Citrus, pine and a light touch of white bitter. Medium gentle bitterness lingers with a clean finish. Could be my everyday IPA.

33 cl. can @ home, bought @ Una Mas, Nieuwegein. Berling brewed version.
Clear dark yellow with a big white head. Citrus aroma with some light tropical fruit. Bitter taste with a crisp bitter finish. Nice old-fashoned proper bitter IPA.
Semi hazy yellow liquid, average head. Fruity aroma of hops. Light body, average carbonisation. Taste is bitter, a bit fruity.
Ok, first sip of this beer seemed lik it was quite awful. But it turned out to be a nice bitter and dry ipa. Well achieved. Like the hoppy bitterness.

Can from Jumbo supermarket in Gorinchem, The Netherlands. 
The beer is clear orange colored with a large and stable broken white foam. Carbonation is very good. 
The aroma is caramel malts and fresh and fruity hops, with citrus, grapefruit, grass, flowers, pines, tropical fruits and spices. 
The taste is medium bodied and starts with caramel and goes to pretty hoppy and fruity with grapefruits, citrus, tropical notes and a spicy ending. 
The finish is dry, very bitter and refreshing. Also long staying. 
Very good!
Стандартное классическое индия пейль эль. Пить можно хоть каждый день. Чистое и ароматеное. Умеренная горечь.
Stone IPA 6.9%. Golden, pine, citrus aroma, medium bodied, citrusy, grapefruit, oranges, orange peel, complex flavours, bittersweet finish. Classic IPA from Berlin, Germany 🇩🇪

Aromas a pino, algo de pomelo y melocotón o tal vez albaricoque. En boca se repiten sabores, destacan también los cítricos, especialmente la naranja. La textura es densa y el trago largo. Amarga y resinosa, extremadamente bebible.
Zwykła, klasyczna IPA. Na uwagę zasługuje wygląd i zapach, który zachęca do spożycia. W smaku mamy klasyczną cytrusowo-goryczkową IPĘ.

W smaku lekka słodową słodycz, żywiczne posmaku, goryczka wysoka,  lekko zalegająca.

Wersja z Berlina. Klasyka, oldskul. Żywiczne, ziołowe, dopiero dalej cytrusy. Na szczęście karmelu prawie nie czuć.
Goryczka średnio-wysoka, brak wad.
Solidna IPA.

Aromat średnio intensywny, pomarańcze i grejpfruty, delikatnie trawiaste i ziołowe w tle.
W smaku słodkawe, trochę cytrusów, trochę ziół, goryczka średnia.
No nie zachwyciło, taka niezła IPA i tyle.

Sometimes you fancy an old classic, from the time when IPAs tastes like this. It may feel boring to someone and sign of hardcore tradition for others. Clear golden-amber, white head with excellent retention, even in a plastic cup. Piney, dank, bitter, notes of grapefruit. I won't drink 2 in a row, but it's the IPA. Respect! We'll go back to pastry stouts later!
Happy Valentine’s Day dinner event. This must be amoung the best coming out of Virginia￼.

Aroma : Bready doughy malt, grapefruit citrus and some earthy/pine hop.  Taste : More of a steady resiny hop bitterness rather than an astringent citric bite, although grapefriut citrus is there. Tad different from a usual big citric bite West Coast IPA. Decent!  (Florida tour Nov 2018-bottle @The Cheesecake Factory, Miami Doral)

330 ml can. Poured amber with a white head. Aroma is pine and malt.  The taste is fruity and hoppy with notes of orange, grapefruit, pine needles, key lime and spicy grasses. The aftertaste is bitter, sweet and dry.
Poured amber with a big cloudy head. Lots of hops and citrus in the aroma, as well as the taste. Ok beer. Overhyped

Grande IPA, non eccessivamente amara, pulita in bocca e definiti gli aromi, tipici dei luppoli usati.
Da berne a secchi

Mine has been brewed in Germany.
Golden hazy with a one finger wide head.
Hoppy, with a funky note. Bitter taste with a citric note. Smooth body. Stronger carbonation.
Pours clear golden, medium head and plenty of carbonation. Aroma of earthy pine and herbation. Tastes intensely bitter with a floral backbone. Great example of a West Coast hop bomb.

Bardzo obfita średnio pęcherzykowa piana, opadająca szybko z lacingiem, zostawiając kilkumilimetrową taflę. Kolor jasny, opalizujący bursztyn. 
Aromat bardzo chmielowy, żywica, cytrusy. słody. 
Wysycenie średnio wysokie, wysoka goryczka, lekko ściągająca, bardzo wytrawne, pijalne, ma wszystkie potrzebne cechy IPA.

En copa, cerveza ligeramente anaranjada con una fina capa de espuma blanca. Aroma resinoso, encontrando pino, naranja amarga, fruta madura como melocotón, especias y cereales blancos. En boca, textura ligera y acuosa, de carbonatación media y amargor intensa y persistente en garganta. Sabores a cereales caramelizados, junto con especias, pino, mucha resina y cierta nota a piel de cítricos amargos. Una IPA simplemente espectacular, potente, resinosa y amarga. Que más se puede pedir?
Pours clear amber with a thick white head. Aroma of pine and citrus. Taste has smokey hop notes, intense bitter flavoring, earthy tones. Palate has bitter pine on the nose. Good.

Bottle.  Pours a clear gold color with a thick off-white head and great retention.  Very good lacing.  Strong hoppy aroma.  Very strong bitter flavor. This is for serious hop heads only. Not my preferred style. Yes, I'm not worthy. Haha.

W zapchu żywiczny chmiel, gdzieś w tle leciutkie cytrusy. W smaku żywiczny chmiel. Goryczka średnia do wysokiej z długim finiszem o zabarwieniu ziołowo - kolendrowym. W głębi nuty słodowe. Ogólnie ok.

Kolor złoty, delikatnie opalizujący. Piana biała, wysoka, bardzo ładnie krążkuje. Charakteryzuje się długim czasem redukcji.
Aromat bardzo orzeźwiający, tropikalno cytrusowy, nieco słodkawy Jest przyjemny, świeży i zdecydowanie "lekki".
Smak podobnie jak aromat, są zdecydowane nuty owocowe (tropiki, cytrusy), jest lekki akcent żywiczny, a dalej to rządzi już tylko goryczka. Ta jest mocna, grapefruitowo żywiczna, dość długa, nieco zalegająca.
Wysycenie wysokie, pasuje. Treściwość na poziomie średnim, płyn jest gładki, miękki. Posmak dlugi, generalnie owocowo goryczkowy
Good "old style" IPA. Intense, high quality bitterness. Aroma a little citrusy, a little more earthy I think and grassy. Pale, golden color, clear appearance, nice white head.

Can from Beervana. A classic and one of the best staple IPA's out there. Gold/orange colored with thick white head. Intense hoppy aromas with pine, lime peel, lemongrass and cedar. Powerful mouth puckering bitterness in the mouth with a very long herbal aftertaste. Intense, heavy stuff. Not completely sessionable, but delicious none the less.

Half pint on tap at Dynamo (Six Degrees North), Dundee. Almost clear golden amber with a thick white head. Aroma is quite sweet - cane sugar, ripe fruits, citrus, pine. Taste is caramel, toast bread, ripe fruits, citrus, grapefruit, pine. Orange peel bitterness on the finish. Chewy mouthfeel. Hops and malts coexist in harmony in this very enjoyable IPA.
Would I drink it again? Yes, I would.

Złote, zamglone piwo o obfitej pianie, która zdobi szkło i pozostaje do końca w formie warstewki na powierzchni. Aromat i smak słodowy, cytrusowy, lekko ziemisty. Goryczka średnia w stronę wysokiej. Ogólnie całkiem udane AIPA w bardziej klasycznym wydaniu.

Yes,it is citrucy and piney.soft taste.not too hoppy,but this was canned 13/06/2019,in Berlin.and this was one of the newest ipas I checked at the store.still,maybe the best value for money from Alko in the IPA range?
An american, foggy, amber IPA with extremely high, white head. Aroma is malt, light hops, light citrus, light apple. Taste is very bitter.
Stone IPA, abviously a bitter one for much of Chinese, very classical and fresh aroma of american hops, body is tight, I can feel very good malts being used, give the whole beer a concrete feeling.
Mostly clear golden color.  Minimal head.  Aroma is pine and malt.  Medium body.  Strongly bitter.  Pine, resin, touch of citrus.  Classic west coast IPA.

Can. Clear golden color, fine white head. Intense citrus, resinous and exotic fruit aroma.
Dry and high bitter taste. Astringent, exotic fruity, resinous aftertaste. Medium carbonation, full body.

Golden Ale with slight haze. Mild hoppy aroma. Taste is highly hoppy. There is no malt to balance out the bitterness. This beer could be more clean and refreshing, especially since it’s a regular IPA not a double.
A beautiful beer. Amber, slight bitterness which is true to the style. I like this one very cold.
Found on tap at Smokey Bones in Nashua, NH. Came in a large frosted mug with a frothy white head.  Lovely amber color that left a perfect place throughout. Would strongly recommend

16 oz can. Smells of pine and grapefruit, citrus. Hazy, light amber/ orange in color. Nice balance, a bit more on the bitter side. Tastes briefly of malts, followed by a citrusy hop hit, which then moves to a pleasing bitter finish. Medium bodies, not too thick nor thin. A pleasant, bitter, citrusy, hoppy taste journey with each sip.
Keg at The Euston Tap in 2013. Mid golden. Aroma of citrus, west coast hops, peppery notes and dry grain. Big burst of citrussy hops and piney notes.

15.08.19, puszka z datą do 17.04.20
Aromat głównie cytrusowy (grapefruit, pomelo), z lekką nutą żywiczną po ogrzaniu, w tle lekka słodowość. Ciało średnie. W smaku chmielowo-cytrusowo, ponownie lekka słodowość w tle. Sroga goryczka, szlachetna, dość długo się utrzymująca. Nasycenie średnie.
Świetna klasyczna interpretacja IPA.
Uzupełnienie ocen piwnych bez opisu z uwagi na przeniesienie z papierowych zapisków.

은은한 트로피컬 향. 피지한 탄산이 강하게느껴짐.
쓴맛은 IPA치고는 약한편인듯...
왜 100점인지 모르겠음;;  스컬핀이 훨 나았던느낌
이마트 6680원

On tap in beijing. Of course will not be as good as tap USA. Aroma is a let down because the bar didn't clean tap lines. Piny, buisuit nose, some fruit with zest.  Palate is citrus peel, warm biscuit with a lingering bitter finish. Overall a good beer

Pours Golden like the state it’s from and with a nice white head. Nice punch of flavor starting slightly sweet and fruity, but heavy addition of hops turning this more aggressively into a pine resin and grapefruit note. Nice dry finish with some bitterness to linger there. The pinnacle of the west coast style.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Pite kilka miesięcy po butelkowaniu, więc nie buchało świeżością. Lekko słodowe, trochę owoców tropikalnych i cytrusów, wyraźna grejpfrutowa goryczka. Przyzwoity west coast i tyle.

Ottima. Sapore deciso, amara 6,9%
Lascia in bocca un sapore amaro come la vita

lattina 33 cl, bel cappello di schiuma beige fine persistente, colore giallo velato, al naso intenso frutta tropicale ananas passion fruit lemongrass resina e lievito, in bocca caramello pompelmo e uva, leggero astringente, corpo rotondo equilibrio perfetto con l’alcool, carbonatazione moderata, dolce con amaro accentuato lungo nel finale. Ottima. Stone le fa bene! c. COOP Tenero 26.07.19

Bottle bought at Netto Helsingør, Denmark. Pours golden yellow with sweet fruity aromas and pine tree notes. Tastes dominated by sweet lemon that can be a little bit too much, but at the finish saved by nice dry hoppiness.

Can (Berlin version). Hazy gold with white head. Aroma is hay and barnyard. Reminiscent of a Session IPA. Some sweetness with strong bitter finish. Lively carbonation. Something is off about the flavor balance, too sweet.

Color amarillo anaranjado, con una ligera neblina. Dos dedos de espuma con buena retención. Aroma pino, pomelo y fruta madura con hueso. Gusto en la misma línea del aroma, añadiría notas herbales, amargor intenso y seca al final del trago. Cuerpo acuoso. IPA de manual, icono de Stone.

Can 0,33L. Hazy golden color with big, creamy and long lasting white head. Aroma is fruity, but less than I expected to be. Taste is heavy bitter and hoppy as hell with long lasting aftertaste. It's so bitter, we can't talk about anything else in taste. Medium to full body, very dry, soft carbonation. Very close to imperial IPA style.

Decent brewed IPA, especially within availibility criteria - it's possible to buy at every Tesco Express and other superstores in the UK.
Fresh aroma, the colour is pale and a little cloudy. 
Strong and heavy hoppy taste is a heaven for hopheads and it's the best advantage of this beer.
The hoppy taste reminds of West Coast IPA, however that and additional a high alc. percentage (6.9%) rather go towards to the Imperial IPA. 
Great value for money though.

Zdaje się, że to perfekcyjny West Coast IPA. Wytrawny, mocno żywiczny i cytrusowy, mocno goryczkowy, ale też wyrównany przez delikatny słód, przez co również pijalny. I to wszystko wyjątkowo intensywne. Po prostu super.
Color dorada,opaca,espuma blanca,fina,alta,resistente.Aroma lupulada,citrico,pino,frutal,herbal.Sabor dominante amargor,citrico,pino,frutal,herbal,postgusto amargo prolongado,fresca

Une ipa fidèle à sa réputation, plutôt excellente. Une belle amertume appuyée. Au delà des agrumes, on sent un caractère fumé, mais pas râpeux. C’est long en bouche et robuste mais ça demeure fin , pas écœurant pour un sou. Un peu forte mais ça apporte une rondeur très équilibrée. C’est top

W barwie herbaciane, lekko tylko zamglone. Piana dosyć wysoka, biała, luźna. Aromat cytrusowy, herbaciany, może kwiatowy, niezbyt intensywny. W smaku lekki karmel, owocowość, mandarynki, icetea, przyjemna wyraźna goryczka. Bardzo dobry west coast bez udziwnień.
pite jakiś czas temu. uzupełnienie profilu. Ocena przepisana z utpd. Miłego dnia.
Sort of the “original flavor” type IPA and still one of the best years later. If you have skipped it thinking it would be generic you’re missing out. Extremely well balanced; a classic.
Perfect IPA for hot summer, great aggressive and strong aroma and taste! Stone never disappoints!

the aroma is fruity and hoppy with hints of orange, grapes, pine, tangerine, kumquat and spicy herbs... the taste is fruity and hoppy with notes of orange, grapefruit, pine needles, key lime and spicy grasses... the aftertaste is bitter, sweet and dry...
Strong hop taste with serious bitterness. That's what an IPA should be, maybe could have been more pungent. Great example of the style nonetheless.

Absolute classic. It's only by going through the whole New England thing that I've clocked how much I've truly love this and the West coast style. Aroma– Pine, pine, pine, big style, backed with caramel malts and some lemon rind. Appearance– Golden orange, with medium white head with loads of peerless lacing structure. Taste– The perfect balance of citrus fruit, caramel & biscuits with a cutting bitterness that makes it incredibly moorish and refreshing, but still carries a depth and complexity that few pales can muster, absolute perfection. Mouthfeel– Medium body, pretty smooth and elegant. Overall– Can't really be beaten as a west coast pale, they nailed it a long time ago, the benchmark. Always a great one to come back to, never fails to impress.
Thuis uit een blikje. Goudgeel, helder, goed wit schuim. Een prima aroma, hop. Heerlijk bittere smaak. Betere ipa.

Very peculiar beer!
The color is golden, slightly cloudy. The foam is thick.
Aroma pleasant, not especially bright, flower and citrus.
Taste: Taste is simple and specific. Caramel, fruit. The bitterness is felt.
Aftertaste: hop bitterness
Uitstekende Pale Ale van de onvolprezen stone Brewery in Berlijn. 6,9%, hoppig, grassig, veel koolzuur voor een prikkelende smaaksensatie 👍

Riecht fruchtig nach Mango, Zitrus und Gras. Trübes hellgelbes Bier, sehr ergiebige große Schaumkrone. Der Antrunk ist sehr vollmundig fruchtig. Perfekt carbonisiert und eine sehr angenehme Herbe. Aromen von Harz, Mango und Honig. Sehr intensiv im Geschmack. Sehr gutes IPA
ホップと柑橘系の爽やかさ、甘ったるくないキレッキレの突き抜ける爽快感。ガツンと来る苦味が口の中で暴れています。パンチの効いたビールが飲みたい時はこのガーゴイルにひっぱだかれたくなります。

Pours a lovely clear orange amber with a foamy white head that laces the glass. Nose is stone fruit, marmalade, caramel malt and pine. Grapefruit and stone fruit initially dominates to be replaced by a firm spicy hop bitterness. Very nice balance between bitterness and sweeter malt notes. Definitely one to try.
22 oz bomber poured into a pint glass. Gift from a house guest. Thanks house guest. From the first sip, knew this one was a winner! Try it ASAP, your poor ass will not be disappointed!

From can (brewed in Berlin). Pours clear golden with a medium white head. Aroma of citrus, grapefruit, pines, caramel. Medium body with average carbonation. Taste is light sweet, over medium bitter. Very nice.
Pours a clears gold. Not getting to much on the nose, peachy caramel notes. Packs more on the flavour, solid resiny bitterness, to balance a decent whack of malt which drives a sweetness.

Ich bin kein großer Fan von Stone, da mir das Firmengeflecht zu undurchsichtig ist und man nie recht weiß, aus welchen Brewpub auf der Welt das Bier kommt.
Zu dem IPA kann man aber nichts negatives sagen. Ein tolles Bier mit schönen fruchtig-hopfigen Noten, ohne widerlich bitter zu sein.
Bitter and fresh. Very decent beer, be sure to taste. Grapefruit bitterness in a taste and aroma.
Ladna piana, złociste w kolorze, lekko mętne. Zapach i smak amerykańskich chmieli. Bardzo porządne IPA bez przesadnej goryczy

Tap & Gollem, Amsterdam III 2019. Redelijk fruitig licht zoetige stevige IPA in precies de juiste verhouding. Combinatie van ananas en limoen met een stevige bitter en achterin citrus gras en lichte hoppige smaak die de doordrinkbaarheid niet in de weg staat. Mondgevoel is met zijn verschillende aspecten van fris zurig naar hop dan ook perfect in balans. Donker geel diffuus bier met witte schuimkraag. Ik begrijp dat het een klassieker is en heb meer klassiekers geproefd maar deze kan het echt waar maken.... Alleen gebrouwen in Berlijn maar bedacht  in Californië. Klinkt als Apple ontworpen design from Californië maar de in China. 😂 Ook de craftbier industrie wordt steeds meer geglobaliseerd. Maar waar ie ook bedacht is het blijft een Toppertje! Proefglas & Origineel glas

28-03-2019; can; Bed 'n Beer Hostel, Belgrade, Serbia (bought at Jumbo supermarket, The Netherlands).
Drank from the can, so looks are hard to rate. I poured a little sample. Looks like a nice golden amber, with a rough white head. Thats about all I can say about it. Looks like an IPA should look like. Not bad.
The aroma of the beer is nice. It is exactly as labeled: citrusy hop with a subtle malt aroma. The hops are citrusy, zesty and fresh. Tangerine, lemon and orange, together with tiny touch of pine needles. Very crisp and fresh and quite powerful. The malts brings just a plain malty base layer. It is quite nice. The beer is clearly a powerful IPA, but remains quite accessible. This is done pretty nicely. I like how they've done it. 
The taste of the beer is good. It is a robust bitter beer. But, the bitterness is very well balanced by nice zesty citrus sours and some nice sweet malts. The bitterness is not overwhelming. I like this balance. 
The palate of the beer is fine. Medium body, slightly sticky texture and medium-high carbonation. The finish of the beer is nice. It is filled with citrus, zest and just all of these lovely hop aromas. I really like it. All in all, it is the perfect beer for after a long drive. Or for any other occasion really.

Poured from a bottle into a tulip.  Striking golden orange color with a moderate off-white head.  Beautiful lacing as I drink this.  Aroma is pine and grapefruit.  Moderate bitter, medium body.  Long bitter finish.  Very easy and refreshing to drink.
Dufter ikke af meget, svagt citrus. Flot, blivende skum, en ofte overset detalje. Lækkert bitter uden alt for meget citrus i smagen. Men det er jo en AIPA.
Big, bold and badass IPA. Copper, frothy head, citrus, pine, resiny, thick, dank, bitter, and hoppy as hell, delicious, straight down the line IPA. Quality.

Barwa złocista, klarowne, piana obfita, ładnie oblepia szkło. Aromat chmielowy, nuta cytrusowa i ziołowa. Wyraźna goryczka, nieco zalegająca ale w przyjemny sposób, wysycenie średnie. Piwo dobrze pijalne, wytrawne, o chmielowym charakterze ale z nutą słodową w tle.

0,33er Dose der Berliner Version aus dem Globus.
Honigfarben mit leichter Trübung. Schöner, weißer Schaum. Wahnsinns Geruch nach Orangen, Kräutern, gemähter Wiese und Hopfen. Viel Hopfen. Kräftiger, hopfiger Antrunk, nach dem Hopfen etwas Restsüsse.  Schön ausgewogen. Frisch rezent. Im Ausklang schlägt die Hopfenbittere zu und klingt lange nach. Eine Referenz des Stils.
Янтарное, непрозрачное, с довольно высокой карбонатизацией. Аромат типовой - тропики, фрукты, цветы. Довольно горько на вкус.

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega piirdun iga õlle juures selle tekstiga.
Pours a cloudy orange color with a thick white head. The aroma was of citrus and pine. Taste was grapefruit and hoppy. Bitter finish, but refreshing.
Buena IPA, y viniendo de una persona a la que no le gustan especialmente, es mucho. Buen toque a caramelo, amargor Justo. Buena espuma. Muy rica.

Beautiful almost clear yellow/orange pour with a huge white head. Grapefruit, tangerine on the nose, along with peachy tropical fruits. Taste is medium sweet, over medium bitter. Medium body with average carbonation. Nice bittersweet lingering finish. Good!!

Aroma: lots of citrus, pine, and grapefruit. very hoppy.
Appearance: clear amber color with a two-finger slightly off-white head.
Taste: toasty malt, citrus, pine, grapefruit, medium-low sweetness, very high bitterness
Palate: medium body, medium-high carbonation, very dry in the finish
Overall: It's a typical west coast IPA featuring citrus and piney hop flavor. Nothing special, just another hop bomb.
Klarownomętne złoto. Piękna biała czapa. W aromatach te ipowe cytrusy. Ogrom chmielu, daje o sobie znać chinook. Kwaskowość i moc, długa zdecydowana goryczka.

19.2oz can pours a very light amber color transparent thick foamy head slow carbonation nice lacing smell of caramel piney hops fruits taste hops fruit grapefruit  caramel bitter taste lingers at the end no one flavor overpowers another delicious beer
Pours a clear-ish amber, lots of carbonation and thin head that dissipates quickly. Light hops aroma with floral hops taste. Fizzy mouthfeel. Light plum fruit aftertaste.
En god IPA. Har en masse smag af citrus, så jeg tænker amerikanske humler i den.
Not much to add about this beer. Just a great example of a West Coast IPA . Great balance and drinkability.
Nice on the plate, lots citrus notes. For an IPA it’s quite light also. Overall great beer, highly recommend

Nose: smells like soiled concrete, with hints of moist pistachios and burnt pecknerwood... 

Mouth: tastes like the food found in an unopened tomb, and has a very pleasant public pool-water aftertaste. 

Bottle made out of glass: hard enough to break and threaten bartender for less hoppy drink.

Stone Berlin, piana biała obfita, redukowała się spory czas, drobnoziarnista, uszyła firankę na szkle, duży plus. Barwa złocista, herbaty z cytryną, trunek jest przejrzysty. Zapach: rządzą tu przede wszystkim cytrusy - pomarańcz, pomelo, cytryna; do tego mamy jeszcze przyprawy (choćby pieprz), trochę lasu i słodkości. W smaku mamy ładny balans atakującej na początek goryczki, wraz z kontrującą słodyczą. Bez żadnego nadmiernego pozostawania na podniebieniu, tak jak być powinno. Piję się to wszystko z chęcią i przyjemnością.
Classic. A beer with great ballance of hoppiness. Piny, some grass and herbs, great bitterness at the end
Taken yesterday at Jay Peak at their general Store on their ski center, great tasty IPA after a great ski day.
This is a good standard IPA. Pretty smooth flavor going down but leaves you with that stank ipa breath.

Aroma: Medium citrus, pine, toffee. 
Appearance: Hazy, golden body. Large, white head, small bubbles, Fair retention. 
Flavour: Medium-high bitterness, Medium citrus, grapefruit, candied peel. Medium-light malty, bread. Dry finish with candied orange peel, 
Mouthfeel: Medium body. Medium carbonation. 
Overall: A good IPA, with good hops and bitterness. 

330 ml can, poured. 
21A. American IPA.

Can. Color: Golden, white head. Aroma: Malt, hop. Taste: Moderate to medium sweet malty nicely combined with a good amount of grassy and floral hopbitterness. Medium to over medium bitter. Long lasting finish. Subtle resinous notes and citrus hints. Crisp. Great Westcoast style IPA.

Light beer with peach notes. Good bitterness,
Birra chiara con note di pesca. Buona amarezza,

Pours very hazy golden, topped with sizeable and lasting white head. Mild fruity nose with pine and lots of resin. Moderaze bitterness, herbal with hints of fruity sweetness. Nice, proper IPA. Not spectacular, but pretty nice.

•Color: Entre rubia y dorada, levemente opaca, espuma blanca, con media retención. 
•Aroma: Medio bajo aroma a malta con carácter a grano dulce, aroma a lúpulos con notas cítricas y frutales, sin esteres ni fenoles.
•Sabor: A Malta con intensidad media baja a media con carácter a grano dulce y leves notas a caramelo, sabor a lúpulos con intensidad media a media alta con carácter cítrico, afrutado ; amargor medio alto sin dejar aspereza, balanceada al sabor y amargor del lúpulo, con un final seco.
•Sensación en boca: Carbonatación y cuerpo medio pleno.
•Impresión General: Cerveza color dorada balanceada al aroma a frutos cítricos/tropicales y al sabor/amargor del lúpulo,la malta le da un buen soporte por su ligereza ,medio cuerpo y un final seco con alta tomabilidad.

Wonderfully piney with peach notes and a hint of yeastiness. Assertive bitterness, perfectly dosed and with a tiny sweet edge. This beer is a little syrupy and yet juicey at the same time, almost perfectly balanced overall. Maybe carbonation is minutely too heavy, but that's my only complaint.
Siempre es un acierto esta ipa de aspecto dorado sin turbidez.  Con buena espuma . De sabor ligeramentw amargo citricos . Un poco dulce en boca pero mantiene el sabor en garganta.

As an iconic IPA, this is pretty good already. Only weak point is the slightly bland after taste. The citrus and pine flavor of the hops are beautiful and strong. However, I wish the after taste is matching it’s overwhelming first impression.

Another one of those brews always thought I had prior.  Clear copper orange beer with foamy white head.  Nose is caramel and pine and citrus.  Trees of grapefruit, orange, malty, caramel, pine.  Classic west coast ipa.  Not all that bitter slightly sweet and dry.
Ikonická IPA. Krása. Lehká, dobře pitelná, vyvážená. Není až tak moc nepříjemně chmelená, kořeněná, citrusová... zkrátka tak akorát.
Favorite Beer at summer. very nice taste, and soft, but aftertaste is intensive
Der absolute Klassiker. Fruchtig hopfig mit leichten Malznoten. Etwas Zitrusfrüchte mit ausgewogener Bitterkeit, während zum Schluss hin das leicht malzige durchdringt.
Dank  aroma with subtle pine.  Copper color and thick white head.  Resinous hop bitter flavor with minimal sweet malt and  some grapefruit taste.  Dank, bitter, weed aftertaste
Nice clear classic ipa. Had at brewery but never rated until now. Not too strong of a finish
Pours a clear dark gold, with ample white head. Aroma of complex hops. Taste is rich, notes of hops and more. This is an excellent IPA. Thumbs up.
Rating #666 on RateBeer and it looks like this brewery has some sympathy for the devil as well. Very decent ipa, lots of hops with some subtle sweetness. The devil is in the details...
20oz on tap at the Gordon Ramsey's, Las Vegas. Aroma is light pineapple, light pear. Appearance is clear golden with a white foam. Taste is beer and light sweet. Full body. Great.

Lukt: malt: , humle:skog, sevje, furu, mango, 
Smak: veldig humlete: skog, sitrus, mango. malt. karamel?, 
Stram og lang bitterhet. Fløyelsmyk karbonering, 
En sterk og tydelig IPA; Typisk west coast. Mye "skog"-smaker fra humla og en typisk caramel malt som grunnsteinen til alle smakene. Veldig god.
7,9/10
Tappet på boks 180802 (fersk nok?)
181124
33cl fles. Helder goudgeel kleur, fijne romige witte schuimkraag. De geur is citrus en gras. Smaak is zoet, citrus, gras en dennen. Medium lichaam, veel koolzuur.

330ml Can. Classic West Coast IPA.  A genre redefining beer. Caramel, amber coloured pour with a pure light white carbonation.  Bitter, clean. Incredibly complex layered citrusy hop flavour. Lightcl and very drinkable.

I really like IPA's so this one is really good. It's 77IBU's is a little misleading, it definitely tastes like it or maybe a little more, but not overly bitter. The roasty malt backbone holds this beer together.
Notas de pomelo, piña y resinosas. Bastante turbia. Cuerpo medio y textura aterciopelada. Bebestibilidad media. Buena IPA, aunque no deslumbrante.

330 can at the Craft-Beer Mile, Ruse on 3 November. Pours almost clear with a thick fluffy head, plenty of lacing and slight, coarse, fast-rising carbonation. Gold in colour. On the nose, complex citrus, cumquat marmalade, rye bread. In the mouth, quite bitter with some astringency from the start but which eases though the palate, flavours similar to the aromas but less intense, some sweetness and alcohol presence, smooth - thick texture with a fairly long finish. Overall, the richness and intensity of a DIPA without the alcohol - what's not to like about that?

It's got fruity bitterness and a long, dry finish. Let down by it's obnoxious hop taste which makes it difficult to drink. I love ipas but this seems to overdo hops. Which I didn't even think was possible
Definition of the modern IPA. Hazy gold, aroma of peach and grapefruit. Taste has hops to the fore, and then some balancing malt sweetness. Medium carbonation. A very fine thing.

W zapachu slodko, cos jakby pomelo, mango, marakuja. Biała jak śnieg piana, drobnopęcherzykowa, nawet sie nieźle trzyma. Barwa piwa slomkowa. Klarowne, aż za klarowne. W smaku dużo słodyczy od chmielu. Od slodu słodyczy brak. Goryczka wyczuwalna juz w pierwszym lyku.

Hops smack you in the face straight away, before the slight malt sweetness soothes just enough to allow you to take another swig. I like hops but this is a difficult one to drink. Proper happy to see it in the supermarket though, a cracking example of a hops forward IPA.

W aromacie swieze i przyjemne cytrusy, calkiem intensywnie; grejpfrut.
Ze szkla ponadto slodycz, wrecz lekka mlecznosc, kwiatowosc i owocowosc.
Ladna piana, barwa niemalze slomkowa.
Klasyczne cytrusy, mango, calkiem pokazna mandarynka, leciutki karmel, biale winogrona, slodycz. Goryczka od pierwszego lyka wyczuwalna. Wytrawne.

W zapachu trawa cytrynowa, grapefruitowa goryczka, lekka mleczność, kwiatowa mdłość.
Piana biała, szybko znika. Piwo złoto-miodowe. 
Winogrono, mandarynka, sroga goryczka łączy się z owocową słodyczą. Wytrawne. Dobre wysycenie.

Can, 330 ml  Stone goes big. I've tasted the big boys of the brewery, so it was the time to taste the basic. Looks a bit hazy golden, good head and devent carbo. Typical IPA aromas, peach skin and grapefruit. Moderate IBU, it comes mainly in the long aftertaste. Great one, i can't say even one bad word about it...
Very aromatic IPA. West coast at it's best. Great body and excellent aftertaste of flowers

0,33l can. Pours near clear golden with white head. Aroma of citrus, spruce, tropical fruit, your typical west coast IPA. Taste is fresh, fruity, tropical fruits, citrus, slightly resinous, crisp bitterness from the hops, slight malt sweetness. Great stuff.
Dåse øl købt i fakta 10 kr på bud. Fantastisk IPA til pengene også når det gælder fuld pris. God bitterhed og eftersmag en af mine yndlings IPAer.

Appearance Hazy yellow, small white head, some lacing 

Aroma Grapefruit, orange, citrus fruits, not offensive but very one-dimensional. Some hints of fart 

Taste Mildly sweet, bitter, unbalanced 

Palate Medium body, medium carbonation
Gylden farge med medium høyt hvitt skum. Aroma av ulik frukt. Nydelig smak, sitrus og andre tropiske innslag. Deilig bitter.
Amber with white head. Aroma sweet exotic fruits. Taste dry and bitter, too hoppy for me.

Desde una lata, en cuanto al aroma se lograron apreciar notas a frutos tropicales, notas a pino y resinosas de lúpulo, destacando un carácter cítrico y a piña. Esta es una cerveza con un balance excepcional, el soporte maltoso es complejo, incluso dulce, y armoniza perfectamente con el carácter lupulado que predomina otorgando un amargor agradable en boca (a pesar de sus 77 IBU) y con un retro gusto complejo, duradero y por sobre todo agradable. Referente de West Coast IPA.

J'en ai acheté 4 canettes, bien m'en a pris. Cette ipa "gebraut in Berlin" est excellente. L'odeur est forte en fruit, du corps, de la résine et du fruité, de l'exotique, belle amertume. Je ne sais pas dans quelle mesure sa notation dans le top 50 m'influence. Toujours est-il qu'elle est très bonne. L'amertume est agressive.

Robe orangée, limpide, avec un peu levure en floculation (gros flocons). Nez très houblonné, principalement sur les agrumes (mandarine, pamplemousse), légèrement herbacé. En bouche, l'attaque est amère, aux notes d'agrumes, avec cependant un léger corps, même si l'amertume prend le pas. Une IPA très typée, et réussie.
IPA de estilo californiano, muy lupulada, cítrica y frutal. Bien balanceada con un toque leve a carameloz

Dorada, ligeramente nebulosa, generosa espuma efervescente. Intenso aroma a lúpulo, olor a campo. En boca es punzante, buen punto de gas. Intenso amargor de principio a fin. Rico sabor con notas herbales y sobre todo frutales, uva, pomelo. Bastante potente.
Dåse. Let mørk gylden, kraftig skummende, som dog svinder til tynd ring. Aroma er humlet. Smagen er lidt grape bitter humlet, sim aftager lidt, lidt ensformigt, men ok.

Canned 0,355L. Clear and bright orange crisp and lively color, bubbly and fraught aspect with creamy white head of medium duration. Intence citrusy and cortex aroma, notes of pine, grapefruit, orange, tangerine. Crisp and lively mouth, equilibrate alcoholic and sweet malty taste, notes of aged and riped grapes, orange, pine and resin.

Pours a clear, clean pale golden color. Fluffy white head with tiny compact bubbles with a moderate head retention.
Aroma of oranges dominates with a hint of pine.  Slight grainy malt smell.
Flavors of citrus (oranges) with very low malt sweetness.  
Aggressive bitter hops.
Low carbonation on the palate, long bitter and very dry finish. 
This is a beer with a narrow audience - those who love very hoppy, bitter beers.  It is on the high side of the bitterness scale and taste for an IPA. So if you love highly bitter IPA's, go for it, this ones for you.  If you prefer a more standard IPA or one on the lower side of the IBU scale, don't try Stone IPA.  Nothing against Stone Brewery, they are a great brewery.
Solid Pale Ale. Very hoppy. Flavoures are hoppy, malty with citrus aroma, ant they are making real mess in you mouth with so much alchohol. Golden color with medium head. Refreshing beer.
Bardzo pozytywna IPA, klasyka gatunku. W smaku czuć po troszkę najważniejszego. Chmielewska, lekkie cytrusy, goryczka. Wszystko perfekcyjnie wyważone

Aromat trochę za mało intensywny, ale przyjemny, ziołowa goryczka w punkt. W smaku bardzo stylowo, bez fajerwerek, ale klasycznie. Karmelowe, chmielowe, ale goryczka mogła by być mocniejsza. Tak jak napisali - definicja stylu, ale nie wyróżnia się :)

Jak trochę potrzymać (3 miesiące po rozlewie) to w aromacie wychodzi lekki skunks. Reszta dalej na poziomie. Przyjemne ciało.

Tingly grapefruit pith with floral, piney notes over a medium but not overpowering caramel malt base. Herbal, floral bitterness that lingers. Deliciously soft thick mouthfeel. Golden and retains a frothy head and lacing throughout. Absolutely nails the style. Only wish I could try one that hasn't travelled.
Canned. Clear golden color with small white head. Smooth bitter hops and citrus aroma with strong floral notes. Medium and light dry body with lasting bitter hop aftertaste.

Puszka (Berlin). Piwo miało lekki aromat owoców tropikalnych i cytrusów. W smaku bardziej mango, trochę cytrusów i goryczka grejfrutowa mocna ale niezalegająca. W smaku pojawia się przyjemna słodowa ciasteczkowość. Bardzo smaczne piwo.
Draft beer from hotel bar in Denver, but I’ve had it from cans before. Strong hoppy flavour, but easy drinking.

Can, 0.33l. Brewed in Berlin. Hazy copper pour, one finger frothy white head. Nose is caramel malt and citrus fruits, vague honey.

Medium body, soft carbonation. Very soft mouthfeel, texture has really pleasant thickness to it. Herbal bitter peppery taste. Caramel malts in the background, grassy hops, citrus fruits. Strong herbal notes, spicy. Slight alcohol burn. Long finish, dry with lasting strong bitterness. 

Overall, pretty good IPA. Bitter and tasty.

Découverte en pression à Vienne avec mon cher appiantiqua .
Superbe robe orangée surmontée d'une mousse vanille bien veloutée.
Le nez est sur les agrumes(citron) et fruits tropicaux(mangue)
Le goût est corsé avec des notes épicées et poivrées,des saveurs fruitées et houblonnées.
Le palais est long et frais.
Une bonne PA de caractère!17/20

Color anaranjado, poca espuma y poco para ser una IPA. En boca es algo oleosa, con un sabor a lúpulo muy particular que deja paso a un amargor muy pronunciado. La burbuja es muy fina y agradable. Muy buena.
Can 33cl. Small white layer. Cloudy light orange color. Aroma is hay, nettles, flowers, hint of cabbage. Taste is bitter

Dégustée en pression à Vienne en compagnie de mon petit Kittenbieer.
Température de début 6 à 7°.
Superbe robe orangée translucide, mousse vanille, bonne carbonatation.
Nez : agrumes, orange, mangue.
Goût ultra houblonné, poivré, épicé, fruité.
Finale longue et fraîche.
Super IPA!!!
17/20
Ar: tropical fruit, grass, hops Ap: orange, creamy rocky head, clear T: med/high bitterness, med malty sweetness P: med body, long finish

W aromacie las sosnowy tak intensywny, że na pograniczu syntetycznych aromatów. Bardzo przyjemnie jasne, z piękną czapą piany. W smaku mocno wytrawne, ale z podbudową słodową. Goryczka pojawia się już w pierwszym łyku, mocno żywiczna. Cytrusów brak, ale ma to wszystko swój urok. Bardzo przyjemne

Aroma is Pitney with a little citrus 
Malty like bread crusts. A little water cracker on the finish.

7/31/18
With A on Taco Tuesday!!

Poured from can. Deep slightly hazy yellow with a moderate sticky head. Label is killer as always for Stone beers!

 Nose is a citrusy hop assault. Tons of grapefruit pith with some nice dank notes as well.

Taste is a bitter hop bomb.Bright and very flavorful. Grapefruit pith dominates, shining brightly over lots of other floral notes and a touch of cracker-malt that rounds out the flavor nicely. Strikingly bitter in the best way with just a touch of sweetness.

Palate is lively and crisp. Medium light. Wonderful pithy bitterness lingers.

Overall, I can't believe I haven't tried this before now, but it definitely blew me away. Haven't been huge on some other Stone produces I've tried but this one is just about a perfect IPA. All of the bitterness without the funky/off flavor I taste in something like Arrogant Bastard. Phenomenal beer!!
amber, hazy, sparkling, frothy, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, full body, oily feel, average carbonation, bitter, long finish, hay, nuts, grass, citrus, herbs, woody,
Piney aroma. Some malty sweetness balanced by  medium bitter running through. Lasting bitter finish. Clean quality beer.

From can to snifter. Pour is a transparent orange/yellow, thick white head. Nose is huge hops, citrus, light floral note as well. Taste is medium bodied, bitter with a rounded out sweetness. Finishes crisp on the mouth, juicy ending. Staple IPA.
Can - Golden orange with large white frothy head. Good pleasant citrus aroma. Good mouthfeel. Ok tasting - citrus with a good tang. Ok beer.
Ocena na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji na potrzeby uzupełnienia profilu.

Piana obfita, opadła szybko do 0,5 cm. Jasne złoto,opalizujące. Piękny aromat cytrusów i żywicy. Żywiczna goryczka, sroga już w pierwszym łyku. Cudnie. Nie ma co się rozwodzić, wzorowa klasyczna west coast ipa. Brawo

On offer at a local Netto.  Slightly hazy, dark golden in colour. Aroma of overpowering hops (in a good way) quite bitter (as a good IPA should be) smell of citrus and pine. (Pine is an absolute favourite of mine) all in all, 9.9/10. On the slightly too bitter side for me.

Birra color oro acceso con schiuma fine e persistente. L'amaro compre quasi tutto ed è difficile sentire altro. Inoltre in bocca l'amaro si presenta subito ed aumenta nel retrogusto. L'amaro rimane in bocco per molto tempo. Retrogusto erbaceo e un po agrumato. Una birra ottima, la consiglio.
Can’t remember too much about it honestly other than it was one of my favorite IPAs, I’ll have to pick it up again soon.
Dark gold colour with white head. Citric and resines in aroma and flavour. Tastee in Olut Club de Cata
Smells of citrus hops. Light in color, and a little hazy. Decent white head. Citrus, dry, pine, and good hop bite. Some lemon flavor on the back end.
Appearance is golden yellow, no foam, little carbo. Aroma was hoppy and malty. Taste is medium-high hops! Nice beer!
Clear golden with long lasting low white head. Sweet aroma of herbs .  soft carbonation & a bitter finish.

Can brewed in Berlin, bought at Biervana in Munich. Nice head at first that doesn't stick around. Slightly hazy orange color. Funky dank pine resin nose with some fruits and citrus. I know it's a classic - but it's just too bitter with too little remaining sugar to balance it. The aftertaste is like you've just sucked on an underripe grapefruit, and it just doesn't go away. This beer and others like it are why I didn't touch IPA for years. Nevertheless it's a nice blend of hop flavors, if you like that overpowering bitterness along with it.

0.33l can from Stockmann Tallinn, brewed in Berlin. Pours deep orange, super foamy head. Canned in January (drinking in June), still time until BBD but foam and nose already hint that it could be fresher. Lightly malty nose, fruity hops, some plastic. Tastes medium-bodied, good level of bitterness, not too much, not too little. Some softer fruits and finishes with longer bitter linger. Relatively simple IPA, solid but not overly exciting.

Poured from bottle into glass. Hoppy aroma, bordering on skunky. Not as complex in flavor as I prefer my IPAs but nothing to complain about, quite bready and yeasty with subtle notes of grapefruit and citrus, pine, and pleasant malty background. Has a nice light, crisp mouthfeel and easily drinkable even after it warmed up a bit. Slightly dry, metallic finish. I think I'll try it again, but I'll look for a fresher batch.
Mousse épaisse sur une robe jaune soutenu. Ronde et équilibrée, elle laisse derrière un arrière goût très houblonneux qui se termine par un peu d'acidité.
Goldgelbe Farbe, im Geruch Mango und Harz, im geschmack hauptsächlich floral, Harz, Fruchtigkeit steht nicht im Vordergrund, fast schon ruppiger Abgang mit anhaltender Bitterkeit

Light hazy orange golden with a white head. Mango, maracuja, light ananas, lime, resin, grapefruit, burnt coffee, wood laquer. Penetrating medium to heavy bitterness, medium sweetness, light sourness. Medium carbonation, long dry bittersweet finish. Not a special IPA apart from being a little too bitter.

Helle, ganz leicht trübe Farbe, viel fester Schaum. Sieht schon super aus, so riecht und schmeckt es auch! Dicke Portion Hopfen schon in der Nase, sehr fruchtig (zitrus, Mango,  allgemein Tropenfrüchte), etwas florale Noten mit dabei. Geschmacklich ebenfalls wieder richtig starker und auch fruchtiger Hopfen, 'grasig' florale Note und leicht malziger Geschmack. Außerdem sehr bitter (71 IBU) und trocken auch im Abgang, was mir sehr zusagt. Für mich ein richtig gelungenes IPA, was für teilweise unter 2€ die 0,33 Dose fast schon unschlagbar ist. Auf der Dose heißt es 'Iconic west coast style IPA' - das trifft es für mich gut.

Canette de 33 cl "gebraut in Berlin". Couleur : dorée, mousse blanche éphémère. Odeurs : agrumes, litchee, pin, houblons. Saveurs sur le fruit/agrume (orange amère), fruit exotique (ananas ...), un peu de caramel et de résineux. La carbonatation est vive, bonne longueur, finale sèche et grosse amertume. Bonne IPA
Can. Hazy golden with an off white head. Aroma of tangerines and dough. Flavour is packed with citrussy sweetness and a strong bitter finish.

Original rating: somewhere in 2017
How: can
Colour: golden
Head: frothy, white
Aroma: citrus& tropical fruits, parfym, pine, some very slight notes of grass
Taste: medium body, medium/ heavy carbonation, rich& complex hop aromas: citrus& tropical fruits, pine, long bitter finish.

Re-rate:
How: can @ Himos cabin. BB: 10.03.21, canned one year earlier. Tnx monopoly store. US version.
Head: with careless pour, four fingers. White.
Colour: hazy dark golden.
Aroma: really ripe citrus fruits, slight tropical fruits, caramel, bread, resinous, pine. Quite dank.
Taste: thin to medium body, average carbonation, taste follows aroma. Not as bitter as aroma suggested. Resinous bitterness.
Citrus fruits& resinous bitterness in long aftertaste.
Reasonably well aged.
6-5-6-4-14

2/18/18: Purchased 16 oz draft pour with the Cheeseburger, Onion Rings and Beer $19.95 Special at Burger Brasserie in the Bally's / Paris Walkway. Murky orange pour, white puffy cloud head. Firm hops aroma, citrus offsets the hops. Firm hops taste, pleasant bitterness, citrus slightly offsets the hops. Thin mouth feel, easy drinking. Overall very good IPA.

330ml can. Pours a mild gold with fluffy white head. Large biscuity nose with subtle hops. Medium body with a distinct malt front which is eaten away by American hops. Has an acidic after taste, may not be in the best condition.

Golden with a dense and huge head. Citric aroma with strong notes of pine and lemon. Bitter and dry hoppy taste that lingers for minutes, with a fine malty base in the background. Highly drinkable. A beer that never ceases to amaze me.

330ml can (6.9%) at home on 29 Apr 2018, present from Andrew C (bb 3 Nov 2018): resiny, orange, eggy aroma, golden amber, lively white head with micro bubbles, orange, boiled sweets, some caramel, some citrus, viscous, bitter citrus hop finish.
From a 330ml can, truly an awesome drink. Nice balanced fruity notes, that turn to a full on hoppy taste. This is one of the best IPA's I have had.
Refrescante, amarga límite sin saturar, espuma justa, aroma suave y agradable, se siente espesa al tomarla, exquisita !!!!
Аромат довольно слабый, сухой, хвойный, цветочный. Пена обильная, довольно стойкая. Во вкусе умеренная горечь, хвоя, цветы. Послевкусие очень горькое, однако не такое сухое что плюс.

resin, floral, grass, spruce, citrus, herbs, cereal, hay, caramel, light sweetness, medium sweetness, heavy cloying sweetness, lightly bitter, medium bitterness, very bitter, lightly sour, medium sourness, heavily sour,

It's a toss up between Bell's Two Hearted and this as my top standard IPA. This is a bit lighter on the malt, and maybe a tad more bitter and hoppy. Nice citrus flavor too, but not overwhelming. Very smooth mouthfeel. Light orange semi-clear appearance. Haven't had a Stone yet that I didn't like (a lot). Probably not as good as the Ruination, but lighter and a better price.

330ml can. The first time I had this, it was one of my first IPA's. It almost blew me away, being so unexpected that I actually wasn't sure whether I liked it or not. Having it again now, for the third time almost a year later and having sampled quite a few other IPA's in the meanwhile, I can appreciate that this is quality strong beer. It's lively, with herbal flavours, sweet citrus and hops, followed by a lingering dry bitterness. It's slick in the mouth. Maybe one day this will be the minimum standard for my IPA's and I'll then think it boring, but not today, not for me. This is great.

On draft @ Tap craft beer bar Robertson Quay 

Light, yeastie, Bread and slight grapefruit aromas. On the palate very distinct malt, dry hops, and slight hints of lemon. Medium light bodied and pretty easy drinking despite ABV.

Tap ADT.  Clear golden orange with a frothy, lasting white head and good lacing. Citrus, light grapefruit, gooseberries with bread and caramel.  Medium body, medium carb.  Lingering crisp, bitter finish.  Excellent.

Cloudy golden color with medium, white head and low retention. Aromas of pineapple and ripe mango with herbs notes. Malty taste and hops on the earthy side, with a corrosive and persistent bitterness, pine notes. A perfect IPA for every day and an instant classic.

Caramelo bien marcado. Aroma poco intenso, amargor marcado y tapado con el toque final de caramelo

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Can. Hazy golden copper color. Thick creamy head. More Bitter than usual IPA. Lower fruit tones. Bit Harsh Beer.
W aromacie chmiele, cytrusy, iglaki; w smaku owoco, żywicznie, mocno chmielowo, średnia goryczka; bardzo przyjemne piwo.

330ml can. Deep golden in colour. Pours a 2-3 finger white head, that dissipates quickly, big spacious bubbles. Fresh lemon is dominant on the aroma, slight pineapple, little bit of fresh orange. Toasty caramel, sweet-ish notes coming through. Lovely pleasant bitterness. Balanced Brilliance! By no means is this mind-blowing, just wonderfully drinkable. For the 6.9 abv, I think a lower abv could reach this level of perfect balance. So, in that respect, the balance lets it down, I needed the flavour or the bitterness to be a bit more raging to justify a better score. Cannot reach the top with 'nice'!

Puszka 330 ml. Iconic West Coast (strong) IPA. Doskonała IPA, wszystko tu jest takie jak powinno. Duża goryczka, mocna moc; fajny wygląd i ogólnie wizualna część produktu. Mętne, wysycenie w normie, duuuża pełnia. Sztos.

12-ounce bottle from a 12-pack sampler pours slightly hazy yellow-gold with small creamy off-white head and lacing, along with lots of visible carbonation rising in glass. Aroma: not much, yet some faint bittersweetness. Flavor: malt forward (honey, light brown sugar, toffee) along with a medley of citrus fruits in sweet syrup, nuts, pine. Mouthfeel: medium-bodied.

Berlin version, tap at Fakin. Amber body, white head. Lovely lemon-lime notes in the aroma, backed by light candyish maltiness, but quite clean and well balanced. Perfumey, lemony-herbal taste, again backed by the slightly candyish maltiness, ending bitterish and a bit dry. Very well executed, very good beer, but I've honestly expected far more.

Espuma de buena calidad,color oro, espuma de calidad se conserva bien su aroma mango y olor lúpulo particular. Sabor amargo característico de la típica IPA y sus 6,9 % bien equilibrados.
En definitiva, una Indian Pale Ale recomendable
Una IPA de les de sempre... però que no aporta gaire novetats. No és de les millors de Stone

Can brewed in Germany. Clear dark yellow beer with white head. Aroma is kind of light, mostly hops. Taste is again mostly hops. Very dry and bitter, also bitter aftertaste. Drinkable but kind of boring.
Una IPA bastante suave, lo que hace que se pueda tomar fácilmente. Espuma gruesa y un agradable sabor. Esteticamente la botella esta muy bien.

Pale golden color...
Aroma with noticeable hops...
Taste with caramel and bitter hoppy finish.
Nice IPA from Berlin
This is the standard for IPAs. There are some better ones out there, but when you are the benchmark for all IPAs, folks get up early to challenge the thrown.

Aromat jest średniointensywny, nic nadzwyczajnego - głównie las, żywica, iglaki. Za to goryczka zabija! Jest bezkompromisowa, ale nie przesadnie zalegająca, pestkowo-łodygowo-ziołowa. West coast nigdy mnie nie powalał, ale tutaj smak naprawdę wymiata.

Wygląd: Barwa jasnozłota, średnio opalizująca. Piana biała, średniej wysokości, zbudowana z różnych oczek z przewagą średnich pęcherzyków, opada do ostatniej warstwy pozostawiając lacing.
Aromat: Średnio lotny. Na średnim poziomie cytrusy, cytryna, limonka, pomelo, pomarańcza wraz z owocami egzotycznymi w postaci melona, kaki, nuty ananasa oraz żywiczności. Całość uzupełniona słodowością chlebową z akcentem tostowym na średnioniskim poziomie. 
Smak: Również średnio intensywny, zdecydowanie na pierwszy plan wysuwa się żywiczność, sosna na średniowysokim poziomie, kosztem cytrusów, owoców egzotycznych i słodowości ze składowymi z aromatu, które występują na średnioniskim poziomie. W ustach półsłodkie, treściwość średnia, gładka z odrobiną lepkości, wysycenie średnie. Goryczka średniowysoka, żywiczno-grejpfrutowa, średniej długości, zdecydowana, ale przyjemna. Finisz półsłodki z przyjemnie zalegającą żywiczną goryczką średniej długości.
Ogólnie średnio intensywne, choć nie można porównywać z dzisiejszym trendem DDH, bo to inna bajka. W aromacie za dużo słodowości, smak zdominowany przez sporą, ale przyjemną żywice.

Bottle.

Beautiful lacing contributes to the impressive mien. Citrus. Pine. Fruit hints. Subtle hop hit.

Stone IPA is another classic west coast ipa in this day and time filled with NE and juicey IPAs. Love these throwback styles . Very similar to the Dry County IPA I tried a week or so ago. Stone is always putting out 1st rate products.

Złote, opalizujace, piana drobna, powoli redukuje do trwałej cienkiej tafli. Wyraźna chmielowość, białe owoce cytrusowe i iglastość. W smaku początkowo jest zarysowana baza słodowa, potem daje znać wytrawność i chmielowy smak, goryczka jest wyraźna i wysoka, żywiczna, nieco długa. Nasycenie średnie.

Aroma of fruits, citrus and hints of grass and grains. Golden with a white head. Medium sweet and medium + bitter. Medium body with a average carbonation. Dry and bitter finish. Overall an OK IPA, but a bit on the boring side.

0.33 can
C: light amber gold
N: honey, floral, malt, caramel
P: strong honey presence, heather, light orange bitters
Can. Pours orangey with white head. Malty, spicy and bitter at the end with a slight alcohol kick. Really good, no hint of unpleasant tastes here.

4 month old can > wine glass, 1 week until Enjoy By.
A: Cloudy light orange gold pour with 1/4" of beige foam that quickly fell to a film, leaving tracks of lace.
S: Light scent of mainly pine, tangerine and toffee. A little alcohol and wood.
T: Bitter grapefruit pith and orange pulp with caramel and wood malt notes.
M: Medium body with crisp carbonation and wet resinous finish.
O: Pretty good all around IPA.

Lekko zmetnione, trwała piana. Aromat słaby, trochę żywicy i owoców, zboże. W smaku fajniej, dość sporo owoców i iglaków, półwytrawne. Goryczka średnio niska jak na IPA, dość krótka, owocowo pestkowa. Nie czuć tego 7% alko. Trochę przereklamowane

12 oz bottle at Il Birrificio Camberwell Vic. Pours hazy apricot with small white head. Aroma is big, tropical fruits with a little citrus. Flavour is dominated by bitter hop hit. The solid malt backbone provides plenty of support for the hops. Taste is strongly bitter with reasonable sweetness underneath. Palate is thick with a slightly creamy or oily mouthfeel. Lasting residual bitterness on the front and mid palate. Overall a very good big IPA. Not easy to find in Australia but worth the hunt.

Orange brass in color, medium carbonation. Too much pine and lingering bitterness for me, the bitter aftertaste will stay with you a while. Decent carbonation and retention with the lacing. Not enough smoothness and fruitiness, straight pine and bitter. While I will call it a very good IPA it's just not one I come back to very often. I did today and so the review. Still very good if you're a fan.

Aussehen : Gold Gelb, leichte Trübung / Schaum : Feinporig, weiß, langer Stand / Geruch : kräftige Mango, Zitrusnoten, leicht süßlich / Geschmack : hopfig, Zitrusnoten, alles recht mild, Abgang recht bitter
Sweet aroma of herbs & clementine. Clear golden with long lasting low white head. Light sweet & medium bitter taste. Full bodied, oily texture, soft carbonation & a bitter finish.
Color dorado, buena retención de espuma. Amargo sabroso y sabor a hierbas y pino. Muy buena!

De Stone Brewing Co.(E. U. A.)esta iconica IPA sandieguina, bautizada simplemente como “Stone IPA” tiene 6.9% ABV y 71 IBU's, contiene una variedad de lúpulos tales como Magnum, Chinook, Centenial, Azacca, Calypso, Motueka, Ella y Vic Secret, una de las primeras IPA's con ese punch de amargor que desataron la fiebre por los lúpulos, este año está popular receta cumple 20 años en el mercado, probemos esta IPA de la vieja escuela para juzgar como a evolucionado el estilo y como a envejecido la misma receta. 
En apariencia mantiene una corona de espuma delgada con mediana retención formada por perlas medianas, actividad de carbonatación mediana, color dorado claro de aspecto filtrado, cuerpo ligero al ondearlo en el vaso. 
En nariz presenta una intensidad bastante clara y enfocada a los cítricos, principalmente aromas a toronja, naranja, piña, resinosa, quizás no tan compleja pero si muy marcadas todas las nota, lo suficiente para dejar claro que por lo menos en este aspecto es una IPA cumplidora. 
Ya en paladar presenta un  amargor potente hasta algo desbalanceado creería yo acompañado de astringencia que si puede llegar a molestar, ligero dulzor, los sabores encontrados son a cáscara de toronja, naranja verde, piña, resinosa, satura el paladar de inmediato, presencia de cuerpo ligeramente mediano, retrogusto de permanencia basta en donde predomina la toronja, como dije algo desbalanceada permanece en el mercado como un clásico y es buen ejemplo del enfoque o balance que se buscaba en una IPA hace 20 años, hoy en día el mercado pude IPA's con amargor marcado pero una buena base de malta que las haga más balanceadas y se pueda apreciar más claramente todos los componentes en el paladar.
Vycap B33R. Zlata farba, husta biela pena. Vona sladova, citrusova, jemne mango. Chut sladova, hutna, citrusove tony, mango, mandarinka. Horka dochut. Prijemne

A bottle from Jasons, near NCCU. Aroma: rather indistinct yeasty, surprisingly uncitrusy. Appearance: clear amber, 1mm. off-white head. Palate: Medium-bodied, rather thin, average carbonation,pretty astringent at the finish, but less so than the 'go to...'. Taste: heavily bitter, much less grapefruit than the 'go to...'., higher ABV unnoticable, not my cup of tea.

Pivo u limenci. Ovi iz "Pivovare Kamen" se hvale da je to jako popularna IPA u njihovoj zemlji. To mi je prva IPA " koju sam uspio probati a koja dolazi iz U. S. A  , zemlje u kojoj je nastao taj (dorađeni) pivski stil koji dominira u Craft pivarstvu , i još je na Top 50. Ukratko , pivo ima klasičnu citrus&hop aromu. Pivo nije pregorko. Gaziranost je srednja. Ali sve u svemu, očekivao sam više od tijela i balansa. Vrlo dobro pivo , ali ne i odlično.
Served in can on Amtrak travel, mostly fresh and consistent with current canned options in stores and bars. Strong bite IPA higher bitterness index but a fave for those who are ok with that.
Keg @ Trades Club, Hebden Bridge. Golden with a thin head. It's a hoppy ale, flavoursome, with a strength including caramel in its nose and lingering finish.

Puszka 0,33 l. Wypita 15.01.2018. Piwo uwarzone w Berlinie. Barwa złota, delikatnie zmętniona. Piana biała, gęsta i trwała, ładnie osadza się na szkle. Mocny cytrusowy aromat. Poza tym bliżej nie określona, nie zbyt fajna nuta, trochę jakby stodoła. W smaku potężna goryczka, ale też sporo słodkości, takiej klejącej. Konkretna ilość cytrusów, przede wszystkim gorzkiego grejpfruta. Wysycenie średnie. To piwo jest naprawdę dobre, choć nie jest idealne.

Berlin brewed can. Medium white head with good retention. Hazy gold body. Grapefruit, pine resin, alcohol, biscuity malt, herbs, green grass, honey, citrus, raw cookie dough, fruit, B vitamins, iron. Taste is bitter, tangy, tannic and some slight umami. Dusty dry finish. Good.
Piwo w puszcze 0,33ml. Piwo w aromacie trochę słabe, czuć coś niepokojącego. Ogółem piwo nie jest złe.

Can 330ml at home. BBE 2018-09-07, canned 2017-12-11, Berlin brew. Clear  golden, off white head. Classic WC IPA. Malts, fruity hops, grapefruit, caramel, pine. Medium bodied, average carbonation, bitter finnish. Original rating 2008-10-15 from bottle at The Belamar Hotel Manhattan Beach CA 8-3-8-3-14.
From a can from the Berlin brewery. Floral, herbs, mild lemongrass, pale, hazy, minimal head. Light sweetness, medium bitterness. medium body, oily feel, soft carbonation, bitter finish.

golden shower,bitter, some fruits,a bit sweet, bitter aftertaste, oke, but not at their
best
On tap, clear amber-copper. This one is quite bitter. Not very floral, but the citrus taste is there. The crispness really carries it.
Pours a golden amber with a white head from the tap. Citrus and pine aroma. Crisp and very hoppy with a lingering bitter aftertaste.

Berlin can. Aromas of malt, hay and subtle grapefruit. Taste is quite bitter with some malty sweet and metallic notes. High carbonation and medium-full body. Long lasting bitter aftertaste. I believe one of the reasons Stone Brewing went to brew in Berlin was to prove a point that Americans can make good or even better beer than the Germans. They failed to do so with this one.
Flagship of Stone brewery. All beer I tasted in Berlin, and they are actually brewed in Berlin. This one is very good,  fruit aromas, grapefruit, balanced beer.

I am quite surprised I haven't tasted this one before. Especially when I see this towering high grade it has on this site! And I quite disagree. Usually I can follow voting here really well. But this is an unremarkable IPA, heavy on the bitter side and not very flowery or even hoppy. Maybe it is because it is now also brewed in Germany and it doesn't taste as its US counterpart, but that would be a disgrace really. Don't fancy this one much.
Can. Great aroma but otherwise lacks balance. Astringent bitterness dominates the taste, overcarbonation makes it even worse. Decent but disappointing.
Puszka 0,33l kupiona w Carefour. Ocena na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji. Na pewno świeższe byłoby lepsze, jednakże piwo miało 2 miesiące do terminu.
citrus, spruce, floral, pale, hazy, frothy, white foam, very bitter, medium body, oily feel, lively, nice bitter finish,

Uzupełnienie profilu notatki.
Piana obfita trwała, zdobi szkło. Kolor jasno złoty lekko zmętniony. Aromat cytrusy, cytrynowy od chmieli, lekko słód, niezbyt intensywny, przyjemny. Smak również cytrusy, trochę las, lekko słody i wysoka ale pasująca goryczka. Piwo mocno pijalne ze średnim ciałem, ukrytym alkoholem. Bardzo dobre, nie rzuca na kolana. Kolejne przereklamowane top50.

Pours a deep golden amber coloration with a large frothy head. Smells mainly of hoppy grapefruit and orange notes, with a hint of pine as well. Taste follows the nose, being dominated by hoppy grapefruit and orange rind notes, but with quite a resinous character, light caramel malt and strong pine as well. Finishes with a medium/strong bitterness and quite a bit of pine lingering in the aftertaste. Smooth mouthfeel with a medium body and carbonation. This is the quintessential West Coast IPA with its resinous character and notes of grapefruit, pine and caramel malt. Probably the best value-for-money IPA in Germany, if you can find it fresh.

330ml can from Marks & Spencer, Reading. Amber colour with white head. Watery hops, watery mixed citrus, light pine resin, watery grapefruit juice, tastes almost like a session IPA despite the abv. Chalky, slightly sticky body. Enjoyable IPA but definitely doesn't deserve 3.94 av.
Bitter but refreshing at the time . hints of citrus . Full of hops typical of a strong IPA .
Hazy golden colour. Aroma strong flowery and caramel. Complex flavour. Long lasting bitter finish. A crispy and very refreshing IPA.

Appearance: clear golden color, with thin head. 
Aroma: floral hops, citrus, malta 
Taste: pine, hoppy and ends a bit bitter.
bevuta alla spina, onestissima ipa colore non troppo torbido tendente all'ambrato schiuma generosa persistente, beverina secca e ben equilibrata

Nice amber/gold color; Medium creamy body; Aroma of rich floral hops, citrus, & some malt; Flavor of malt, pine hops, citrus (notably grapefruit), and some caramel; Finish is bitter & lingers a bit; Nicely balanced; Really nice IPA.
Can from kvickly, Odder. Pours golden color with medium white head. Aroma: Citrus, grapefruit, light apple and some hay. Taste: light citrus, pine, grapefruit, long lasting highly bitter aftertaste.
W aromacie cytrusy, najbardziej czuć pomarańcze. W smaku fajne wytrawne ale orzeźwiające. Piwo nieziemsko pijalne. Lekko za duże wysycenie.Finisz pusty. Bardzo dobre

Aromat chmielowy, cytrusowy, grejprfutowy, ale nie jakoś wybitnie intensywny. Drobna piana, ale utrzymująca się do ostatniego łyka. Bardzo wytrawne, fajnie zaznaczona grejprfutowa goryczka, dobrze pijalne. Klasyka.

Can at Dusseldorf airport. Clear yellowish with white head. The aroma is piney with notes of tropical fruits and citrus. Bitter flavor with notes of citrusy hops, piney, some tropical fruits, "green". Slightly dry, medium-bodied.
